text: Year 2 BC was a common year starting on Thursday or Friday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Augustus and Silvanus. == Events == * Emperor Augustus is made Pater Patriae, or "father of the country" by the Roman Senate * Julia the Elder is exiled on charges of treason and adultery * Phraates V becomes king of the Parthian Empire == Births == *Jesus (approximate date, according to Eusebius of Caesarea and Jehovah's Witnesses) == Deaths == * Iullus Antonius, son of Mark Antony and consul in 10 BC * Phraates IV, king of Parthia
title: 2 BC
